A

addNumInCart(int) - Method in class Product
Method that adds the input value to the numInCart variable and sets inCart to true
addQuantity(int) - Method in class Product
Method that adds the input value to the quantity variable
addToCart(Product, int) - Method in class ShoppingCart
Method that adds Product object to the cart ArrayList and removes the quantity specified from the object's quantity variable
addToStore(Store, Product) - Method in class InventoryManager
Method that uses the .add() method on the Store object's ArrayList to add the specified Product object
Armor - Class in Unnamed Package
Class that extends from the Product class and uses the super keyword to set the appropriate description
Armor(String, double, int) - Constructor for class Armor
Constructor method that uses the super keyword to initialize values

C

clearCart() - Method in class ShoppingCart
Method that sets the cart variable to a new empty ArrayList of Product objects, effectively clearing the cart
compareTo(Weapon) - Method in class Weapon
Overridden method that is used to compare two Weapon objects by their names

D

displayCart() - Method in class ShoppingCart
Method that displays the information of each Product object in the cart ArrayList
displayStoreItems() - Method in class Store
Method used to display all Product object's information that are in the store
Driver - Class in Unnamed Package
Class to contain a main method which initializes a Store object and runs the different game commands

P

Method that uses the addProduct() method on the Store object to add the different inventory items to the store list
Product - Class in Unnamed Package
Product class which initializes the different variables stored in the Product object such as name, description, and price.

Constructor method which sets the values of the initialized variables

Method used to purchase the items that are in the shopping cart.
purchaseOptions(Store) - Method in class InventoryManager
Method to print and register user input for selecting products to put into the cart

R

removeFromCart(Product, int) - Method in class ShoppingCart
Method that checks to make sure the specified Product object is in the cart with the inCart variable and then removes the specified amount of items from the cart and adds it back to the object's quantity variable.
removeFromStore(Store, Product) - Method in class InventoryManager
Method that uses the .remove() method on the Store object's ArrayList to remove the specified Product object
removeQuantity(int) - Method in class Product
Method that subtracts the input value from the quantity variable
returnItems(Product, int) - Method in class Store
Method to return Product objects to the store.

Constructor method with no parameters.

Method that shows the initial options the user has when in the store.
Store - Class in Unnamed Package
Store class which initializes an ArrayList of Product objects, an InventoryManager object, and a ShoppingCart object

Constructor method which assignes the value of the products variable to a new ArrayList of Product objects, prints a welcome statement, initializes the InventoryManager and ShoppingCart, and populates the store ArrayList with Product objects
subNumInCart(int) - Method in class Product
Method that subtracts the input value to the numInCart variable and sets inCart to false if numInCart == 0
